name: ResourceBot
description: A Resource Management Tool for Guilds

GRB_DISCORD_TOKEN.description: This is the 'Token' you copied from 'App Bot User'.

CHANNEL.description: The channel the bot will listen to on your Discord server.

LANGUAGE.description: Language for the resources ... Valid values: de, en

OCR_RESULT.description: If set to 'on', the bot will display the results of the OCR.

DELETE_PICTURE_MESSAGE.description: If set to 'on', the bot will delete screenshots immediately after processing them.

JAVA_TOOL_OPTIONS.description: Memory instructions so this project can run on a free heroku plan
